 2011-16852011-12-15JUS,  ,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectNational Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program ** LEAVE ** Sept. 1, 2012 to April 30, 2013
PrecisOrder granting a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to seven Judges from September 1, 2012 to April 30, 2013, in order to allow them to participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM.
